The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 24 January is 3,187,232 (5,662.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 19 January, there were 246,404 new confirmed cases (437.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 12 January, there were 304,624 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 19% (58,220 fewer cases).
